_comment: This file is generated. Please edit .homeycompose/app.json instead.

description.en: Vitrum Design revolution the idea of Smart Home

instruction.en: Press top button to include. Hold the left button for 8 seconds to exclude

hint.en:
Lifeline report
Add Controller Node ID to the list of Node ID destinations belonging to the Lifeline Group, in order to let the controller receive Central Scene Notification report and  Device Reset Locally Notification reports.

Lifeline report with End Point information
Add both Controller Node ID and Controller End Point to the list of End Points belonging to the Lifeline Group, in order to let the controller receive Central Scene Notification report with the End Point source address information. That may be achieved by sending the Multichannel Association Set Command Class and filling “Multi Channel Node ID” field with the Controller Node ID and “End Point” field with the Controller End Point.
Reserved
Switch 1: Associations nodeid(s)
This parameter (206) configures maximum brightness when button is on
This parameter (207) configures minimum brightness when button is off
This parameter (209) configures if buzzer sound should be enabled for button press
This parameter (218) configures if Front-end Buttons lock should be enabled for button press

hint.en:
Lifeline report
Add Controller Node ID to the list of Node ID destinations belonging to the Lifeline Group, in order to let the controller receive Central Scene Notification report and  Device Reset Locally Notification reports.

instruction.en: Set the device into Learn Mode by pressing and holding button No.1 for longer than 4 seconds. The device will enter into inclusion mode by blinking magenta LED button No.1. Upon successful completion, the device LEDs will blink green three times. Button must be in CC Switch mode, otherwise use the button on the side

Press and hold button No.1 (button must be in CC Switch Mode) for around 6 seconds and after that press 3 times the same button shortly within 3 seconds. LED Button No.1 blinks red upon completing the device exclusion successfully. Button must be in CC Switch mode, otherwise use the button on the side

That may be achieved by sending the Multichannel Association Set Command Class and filling “Multi Channel Node ID” field with the Controller Node ID and “End Point” field with the Controller End Point.

instruction.en: Set the device into Learn Mode by pressing and holding button No.1 (on the left of the device) for longer than 4 seconds. The device will enter into inclusion mode by blinking magenta LED button No.1. Upon successful completion, the device LEDs will blink green three times. Button must be in CC Switch mode, otherwise use the button on the side

Press and hold button No.1 (on the left of the front panel device) for around 6 seconds and after that press 3 times the same button shortly within 3 seconds. LED Button No.1 blinks red upon completing the device exclusion successfully. Button must be in CC Switch mode, otherwise use the button on the side

That may be achieved by sending the Multichannel Association Set Command Class and filling “Multi Channel Node ID” field with the Controller Node ID and “End Point” field with the Controller End Point.

titleFormatted.en: Card is triggered when [[button]] button is [[scene]]

hint.en: This flow card will only trigger if the button setting is in "Central Scene Mode".

titleFormatted.en: Card is triggered when [[button]] button is [[scene]]

hint.en: This flow card will only trigger if the button setting is in "Central Scene Mode". It triggers on all buttons that are in this mode
